function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of public understanding of COVID-19 mitigation and early detection","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus, higher risk of infection and severe cases","Mitigation":"Increased public awareness, education on COVID-19 prevention and detection","Technologies":"Expert systems, mobile applications for early detection","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government, community leaders"},{"Description":"Reliance on web scraping for COVID-19 information","Impact":"Inaccurate or outdated information, misinformation, and unreliable data","Mitigation":"Verification of data sources, real-time updates, and cross-referencing with official sources","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, real-time data feeds","People":"Developers, data scientists, health authorities","Owner":"Health authorities, technology companies, data providers"},{"Description":"Deployment of mobile applications for COVID-19 risk detection","Impact":"Privacy and data security risks, potential misuse of personal health information","Mitigation":"Secure data storage, encryption, anonymous user data collection","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques","People":"App users, developers, government regulators","Owner":"App developers, government regulatory bodies"}]}
